events.message: Applicant submitted a request for a personal loan to cover medical expenses and some existing debts. They have provided preliminary personal and financial information.
The application has been categorised under personal loans based on the stated purpose related to medical bills and debt consolidation.
Assigned loan officer has been notified to take charge of this personal loan application and will begin contact with the applicant shortly.
Initial review conducted to verify applicant eligibility based on credit history, income, and loan amount requested for personal expenses.
Applicant was requested to submit supporting documents including proof of income, medical bills, and current debt statements.
Applicant successfully uploaded all requested documents, including pay stubs and itemized medical invoices for verification.
Credit check returned showing a satisfactory credit score with no recent delinquencies or defaults noted for the applicant.
Risk assessment analyzed the applicant's financial stability and ability to repay, showing moderate risk primarily due to existing debt.
A loan offer was presented to the applicant detailing terms including interest rates, repayment schedule, and loan amount approved.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer, agreeing to terms but requested slight modification in monthly installment amount.
Application escalated to senior loan manager for review of requested installment adjustment and final approval decision.
Senior management approved the loan with requested installment modification, finalizing terms agreeable to both parties.
Loan funds were disbursed directly into the applicant's bank account, initiating the personal loan repayment term as outlined.
Follow-up conducted with applicant to ensure receipt of funds and satisfaction with loan servicing support provided so far.
The loan application case was closed after successful funding and positive confirmation received from the applicant on all terms.
